darkhistory.electrons.ics.nonrel_diff_terms

darkhistory.electrons.ics.nonrel_diff_terms¶

Functions for computing the nonrelativistic ICS spectrum by beta expansion.

Functions

H_and_G(beta, photeng, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the H and G term.
Q(beta, photeng, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the Q term.
Q_and_K(beta, photeng, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the Q and K term.
diff_expansion(beta, photeng, T[, as_pairs]) Computes the expansion for small beta and photeng/T.
